item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260109.4)
item.description:
What's New

Centralize injection method default delays

  • Add defaultDelays computed property to InjectionMethod enum
  • Replace all hardcoded default delays with method.defaultDelays
  • Single source of truth for:

- .fast: (1000, 3000, 1500) - Low delays for responsive apps

- .slow: (3000, 6000, 3000) - High delays for terminals/IDEs

- .selection: (1000, 3000, 2000) - Medium for selection-based

- .autocomplete: (1000, 3000, 1000) - Fast for overlays

- .axDirect: (1000, 3000, 2000) - Medium for AX API

Note: Custom per-app delays (JetBrains, MS Office, Terminals) are

intentionally kept as hardcoded values since they are app-specific.
